CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobilities of the polymers or the polymer : PC 70 BM blends were measured via the space charge limited current ( SCLC ) method using hole - only devices ( ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer or polymer : PC 70 BM / Au ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) |
| PEDOT : PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)) |
| Polymer or polymer : PC 70 BM |
| Au (Gold) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| PEDOT : PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)) |
| Polymer or polymer : PC 70 BM |

The other mentioned entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material names:

* ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) is a conductive material, but it is not a material name in this context as it is used to describe the type of the first electrode in the device.
* Au (Gold) is also a conductive material and it is used to describe the material of the second electrode in the device.
* SCLC (Space charge limited current) is a method, not a material.
* Hole - only devices are a type of device, not a material.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobilities of the polymers or the polymer : PC 70 BM blends were measured via the space charge limited current ( SCLC ) method using hole - only devices ( ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer or polymer : PC 70 BM / Au ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobilities of the polymers or the polymer : PC 70 BM blends |
| via the space charge limited current (SCLC) method |
| using hole-only devices |
| ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer or polymer : PC 70 BM / Au |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobilities of the polymers or the polymer : PC 70 BM blends |
| via the space charge limited current (SCLC) method |
| using hole-only devices (ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer or polymer : PC 70 BM / Au) |

The entities "ITO" and "Au" are not material properties, they are types of materials used in the devices. Therefore, they have been removed from the table.
